init.title: Rebooter Pro Options
init.description: Configure automatic reboot behavior and optional push notifications.

data_description.ar_off_duration_seconds: When rebooting, keep the power off for this many seconds. (10–65535).
data_description.ar_power_fail: If enabled, the equipment will reboot after power is restored.
data_description.ar_ping_fail: If enabled, the equipment will reboot on Internet/Ping failures.
data_description.ar_trigger_minutes: Reboot after unsuccessfully reaching the monitored addresses for this long in minutes (2–10).
data_description.ar_post_reboot_delay_minutes: After restoring power, wait this long, in minutes, before resuming Internet/Ping monitoring. (0–10).
data_description.ar_any_fail: Choose whether to reboot if ANY of the addresses are unreachable or if ALL addresses are unreachable.
data_description.ar_max_reboots: If Internet/Ping monitoring never detects a recovery, reboot at most this many times.
data_description.ar_target_5: Identify up to 5 addresses to ping to dertemine if your device is offline.
data_description.notify_enabled: Home Assistant will send a notification when state changes.
